overview:
Single Hot And Loaded is an online dating group geared towards like minded people who ”enjoy the finer things in life”.

They bring together successful men and women from all over the UK, that are looking to find a perfect partnership in a safe and secure environment.

Single Hot And Loaded allows members to communicate quickly and easily with others using live email, text chat and video conferencing.

3D CITY

Single Hot And Loaded have a virtual ”3D City” which allows members to chat and meet new people in a virtual 3D world. They have a nightclub, cafe, cinema and park, to name a few areas. All are cool places to hang out, walk and talk, meet new friends and make finding that special someone easier and faster than ever before!

VIRTUAL BAR

Single Hot And Loaded’s ”Virtual Bar” is a feature that allows members to make money though Paypal. It works just like a real bar on a night out, so for example, if a member see someone they like… they just click the flashing ”Buy Drink” icon on their profile. Then both members enter into IM chat, however when the conversation has ended, after 5mins, the member that has just received the drink from the other buying member, gets the drink’s value put into their personal account!

Gift Store

Single Hot And Loaded also has a real, online ”Gift Store” with gifts which members can actually buy and secretly have delivered direct to another members door without sharing personal details.
